title: Hackathons for Startups in Ethiopia
description: The tech start-up community is growing constantly, but only a hand full of them heard about Cardano and Cardano Project catalyst.
solution: Organizing effective hackathons regularly twice a month; informing candidates and select the top 5 brilliant projects.
experience: A Full-Stack & Mobile App Eng, tested Plutus playground, B.SC in Computer Science, 4.5 years, connections to startups and incubation hubs.
